actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for a study of a certain segment of the Oklawaha River for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

summary.text: Requires the study of a segment of the Oklawaha River in Florida for its potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

titles.title: A bill to provide for a study of a certain segment of the Oklawaha River for potential addition to the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.
